SMART INDIA HACKATHON 2025
•Problem Statement ID- SIH25011 
•Problem Statement Title- Smart 
Curriculum Activity & Attendance App 
•Theme- Smart Education 
•PS Category- Software 
•Team ID- 70912 
•Team Name- Code Innovation

@SIH Idea submission- Template
❖
Proposed Solution: 
•Holistic 360° Analytics: Students → subject-wise %, Teachers → class-
wise trends + weak performers, Admins → institution-wide performance 
& leave audit.
•Attendance   Automation:   QR/Proximity/Face   recognition →   auto-
marked via web portal.
•Free-Time  Productivity  Layer:  Portal  suggests  personalized  learning 
tasks based on interests and goals.
•Smart   Substitute   Handling:   Automatic   substitute   allocation 
prioritizing main subjects.
❖
Innovation & Uniqueness: 
•Integrated attendance + learning + substitution in one portal.
•Generates analytics on attendance trends, activity performance, and 
participation levels.
•it’s   a smart   academic   productivity   ecosystem that integrates 
attendance,  curriculum,  free-time  learning,  substitution,  gamification, 
and analytics into one platform.
 
Acadify – Smart Education & 
 Attendance Management System
2
Code 
Innovation

@SIH Idea submission- Template
TECHNICAL APPROACH
❖
Technologies to be Used: 
•Frontend: React.js (dynamic UI, QR 
scanning with html5-qrcode).
•Backend: Node.js + Express.js (REST 
APIs, WebSocket for real-time 
attendance).
•Database: MongoDB (NoSQL, flexible 
for timetable, attendance, logs).
•Authentication: JWT/OAuth2 (role-
based access: student, teacher, admin).
•Realtime Updates: WebSocket 
(Socket.IO).
•Scheduling Engine: Node.js + 
optimization logic for teacher substitution.

FEASIBILITY AND VIABILITY
❖
Feasibility: 
•Operational Feasibility
◦
Website-only portal → no app installation needed.
◦
Minimal infrastructure: works with existing PCs, 
laptops, and student phones (browser-based).
◦
Timetable upload via Excel/CSV → easy adoption for 
institutions.
•Economic Feasibility
◦
Low-cost deployment (cloud hosting / on-prem server).
◦
Open-source technologies reduce licensing costs.
◦
Scalable to multiple institutions with minimal overhead.
•Technology Feasibility
◦
MERN stack ensures rapid development, scalability, and 
responsive UI and  flexible schema for timetables, 
attendance, and logs..
◦
QR code & web camera integration easily supported in 
browsers.
4
Code 
Innovation
❖
Viability: 
•Institutional Adoption
◦
Solves real problems: wasted class time, 
proxy attendance, unproductive free slots.
◦
Transparent reporting builds trust among 
students, teachers, and administrators.
•Challenges
◦
Resistance to change from teachers/students.
◦
Risk of QR sharing / proxy check-in.
◦
Privacy concerns in biometric attendance.
•Strategies to Overcome
◦
Rotating QR/session tokens + device/IP 
binding.
◦
Teacher override/manual verification option.
◦
Face recognition made optional & consent-
based (only embeddings stored, no raw 
images).

@SIH Idea submission- Template
IMPACT AND BENEFITS
❖
Impact: 
•Students →Better time management, structured learning in free 
slots, higher attendance engagement.
•Teachers →Saves 5–10 minutes per class, reduces manual 
workload, accurate records.
•Administrators →Real-time analytics, efficient substitute
•allocation, improved academic monitoring.
•Institutions →Transparent attendance system, improved teaching 
hours, aligns with NEP 2020 guidelines.
❖
Benefits: 
•
Personalized learning → aligns with NEP 2020.
•
More teaching time → improved learning outcomes.
•
Promotes discipline & accountability among students.
•
Builds fairness by reducing proxy/fake attendance.
•Real-time dashboards & automated substitute allocation.
•
Accurate reports for audits & performance tracking.
•
Low infrastructure cost (web portal only, no hardware dependency).
